thread.section_title: Rhodes Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Qualité prix.
thread.title_full: Qualité prix. - Review of Rhodes Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lisettte C
title: Qualité prix.
text:
I have really enjoyed my stay! The quality of service was exquisite! The staff was more than helpful. Moreover the location is very strategic.Grateful for the quality that was offered, it was money well spent!
Room Tip: However the room was a bit dusty, but nothing too serious. Thank you for your service! See more room tips
